      public long getAsLong()
      Estimates the number of keys that match the given pattern and type.
      Specified by:
      getAsLong in interface LongSupplier
      Returns:
      Estimated number of keys matching the given pattern and type. Returns null if database is empty or any error occurs
      Throws:
      IOException - if script execution exception happens during estimation
